US Release Date: November 26, 2025
Starring: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Ke Huy Quan, Fortune Feimster
Director: Byron Howard, Jared Bush
Synopsis: In Walt Disney Animation Studios' "Zootopia 2," detectives Judy Hopps (voiced by Ginnifer Goodwin) and Nick Wilde (voiced by Jason Bateman) find themselves on the twisting trail of a mysterious reptile who arrives in Zootopia and turns the mammal metropolis upside down. To crack the case, Judy and Nick must go undercover to unexpected new parts of town, where their growing partnership is tested like never before.

US Release Date: February 13, 2026
Starring: Caleb McLaughlin,  Gabrielle Union, Nick Kroll, Nicola Coughlan, David Harbour, Stephen Curry, Jenifer Lewis, Patton Oswalt, Jennifer Hudson, Aaron Pierre, Jelly Roll, Sherry Cola, Bobby Lee, Andrew Santino
Director: Tyree Dillihay 
Synopsis: You’re never too small to dream big. From Sony Pictures Animation, the studio behind Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse, comes GOAT, an original action-comedy set in an all-animal world. The story follows Will, a small goat with big dreams who gets a once-in-a-lifetime shot to join the pros and play roarball – a high-intensity, co-ed, full-contact sport dominated
